hero.title: Share Your Expertise on
hero.description: Write practical, experience-driven content on internal linking, site architecture, or AI SEO — and we'd love to hear from you.

topics.intro: Our readers include SEO professionals, agency owners, content marketers, and website operators looking to scale organic growth with smarter internal linking.
topics.subtitle: We accept in-depth, practical content on:

list.title: Internal Linking Strategy
list.description: Advanced and practical frameworks for improving link equity and topical authority.

list.title: AI in SEO
list.description: How AI can assist with content optimization, internal linking, and SEO workflows.

list.title: Technical SEO & Site Architecture
list.description: Crawl depth, orphan pages, link flow, and structural optimization.

list.title: Competitor SEO Analysis
list.description: Reverse engineering internal linking strategies and content clusters.

list.title: Link Equity & Topical Authority
list.description: How to distribute authority effectively across large websites.

list.title: SEO Automation & Workflows
list.description: Scaling SEO processes using tools, APIs, and automation systems.

guidelines.title: Guest Post Guidelines
guidelines.subtitle: We maintain high editorial standards. Please review carefully before submitting.

content.title: Content Guidelines
items: Content must be 100% original and human-written
No AI-generated spam or low-effort articles
Practical insights only — no generic SEO advice
Include real examples, frameworks, or case insights

link_policy.title: Link Policy
items: No links in the first paragraph
No casino, crypto, adult, or gambling content

editorial_rights.title: Editorial Rights
editorial_rights.footer: Final publishing decisions remain with our editorial team.

form.title: Write for Dofollo
form.subtitle: Guest Contribution Request Form
form.description: Submit your request to contribute a guest article or suggest a contextual link placement.
form.note: We review only high-quality, original submissions from verified business emails.
form.join_text: Join Dofollo to share expertise with SEO professionals and digital growth teams worldwide.

email.label: Work Email Address
email.help: Please use a business or domain email. Free email addresses (Gmail, Yahoo, Outlook, etc.) will not receive a response.

contribution_type.label: How would you like to contribute?

target_url.label: Target URL
